chapters.title: Chapter 34: The Last Village
chapters.info: Elayne Trakand, p. 441—Daughter-Heir of Andor, daughter of Morgase and sister of Gawyn. She is quite pretty. She is preparing to leave for Tar Valon to undergo novice training, as all daughters-heir of Andor have done since the nation's founding. See also Damodred, Taringail; Trakand, Gawyn; Trakand, Morgase.
